data: This order set applies to Newborns at risk of sepsis Age 0 to 7 days, GA 35 weeks or greater, weight 2200 g or greater.  Consider admission to Mother Baby Care or NICU for initial assessment and observation
As per PSBC Guidelines and then q4h, until antibiotics discontinued
If any change in status (temperature instability, respiratory distress, tachycardia)
Insertion to be done by NICU Nurse
Refer to policy or procedural guidelines on administration of IV push antibiotics via saline lock for newborns
50 mg/kg, IV, q8h interval, order duration: 48 hour
2.5 mg/kg, IV, q12h interval, order duration: 48 hour
If/when blood culture is positive, then notify primary care provider immediately
If/when blood culture is negative, then notify primary care provider for further instruction
